related_post.text: Is there any way to say use this executor for this specific go block in core.async?

so_post.text: @Johnny only for one specific go block? You could try some dark magic likehttps://stackoverflow.com/a/38577871/1888507But I see it very hard. Globally maybe for one go block maybe not...

comments: asker wants to accomplish something with a specific go block and they get an SO post answer which is a strange workaround. although it might not be the ideal answer, its an answer still
